title: What's the new Qualcomm and Reliance Jio deal for 5G? - Quora

response.answer_text: Qualcomm is one of the top world's largest wireless technology Company. Most of mobile phones use snapdragon chip is designed by Qualcomm and is transforming every industry by providing 5G services. Qualcomm will invest 730 crore in jio platform in exchange of 0.15% stake. Steve Mollenkopf, CEO of Qualcomm said that “With our shared goal of extending the benefits of digital connectivity to everyone and we anticipate Jio Platforms will deliver a new set of services and experiences to Indian consumers. With unmatched speeds and emerging use cases, 5G is expected to transform every industry in the coming years," Whereas, Mukesh Ambani chairman and MD of reliance industries says “ Qualcomm offers deep technology knowhow and insights that will help us deliver on our 5G vision and the digital transformation of India for both people and enterprises From statement it can be inferred that investment focuses on buliding infrastructure for wireless network connectivity and to deliver 5G vision and digital revolution in India.
